I've always found the split testing UI in @Netlify gratifying. But I'd never noticed the little bouncing padlock on locked branches letting me know that I can't adjust some weightings because maths. Boing! ❤️ Love it. Related: https://t.co/yNMOeWd30k https://t.co/f5vYMwS0h2
